meanings.definition: To make more cheerful or confident.
meanings.sent1: Seeing his friends smile heartened him.
meanings.sent2: The kind words from her teacher heartened the student.
meanings.sent3: The funny joke heartened everyone in the room.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected good news heartened her like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flowers blooming in the garden heartened her spirits.

meanings.definition: To give strength or courage to.
meanings.sent1: The coach's pep talk heartened the team before the game.
meanings.sent2: The support of her family heartened her during tough times.
meanings.sent3: The superhero movie heartened the kids to be brave.
meanings.sent4: The majestic mountain view heartened him to conquer his fears.
meanings.sent5: The inspiring story heartened her to face challenges head-on.
